title: Apple and pear tart
ingredients: ['110g unsalted butter, chilled', '110g cream cheese', '200g plain flour', '2 apples, peeled, cored and thinly sliced', '1 pear, peeled, cored and sliced', '4 tablespoons orange juice', '70g dark brown soft sugar', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1/4 teaspoon ground cardamom', '1 1/2 tablespoons cornflour', '125g apricot jam, warmed']
